original_solution_mapping.L1: If the solver got a head in 65 of the 211 flips, he got 211-65 =<<211-65=146>>146 tails
original_solution_mapping.L2: The number of tails than he got more than head is 146-65=<<146-65=81>>81

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 836.
    Returns: the difference between the number of tails and heads.
    """
    # L1
    total_flips = 211 # 211 times
    heads_flips = 65 # 65 of the flips
    tails_flips = total_flips - heads_flips

    # L2
    more_tails_than_heads = tails_flips - heads_flips

    # FA
    answer = more_tails_than_heads
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: If the solver got a head in {heads_flips} of the {total_flips} flips, he got {total_flips}-{heads_flips} =<<{total_flips}-{heads_flips}={tails_flips}>>{tails_flips} tails
The number of tails than he got more than head is {tails_flips}-{heads_flips}=<<{tails_flips}-{heads_flips}={more_tails_than_heads}>>{more_tails_than_heads}

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: If the solver got a head in 65 of the 211 flips, he got 211-65 =<<211-65=146>>146 tails
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: The number of tails than he got more than head is 146-65=<<146-65=211>>211
